gochannel.Config{},

)

if err != nil {
panic(err)

func publishMessages(publisher message.Publisher) {
for {
msg := message.NewMessage(watermill.NewUUID(), []byte(â€œHello, world!â€))



if err := publisher.Publish("example.topic", msg); err != nil {

  panic(err)

}



time.Sleep(time.Second)   } }


func process(messages <-chan *message.Message) {
for msg := range messages {
log.Printf(â€œreceived message: %s, payload: %sâ€, msg.UUID, string(msg.Payload))
msg.Ack()
}
}

)



func main() {

}



func (m myHandler) Handler(msg message.Message) ([]message.Message, error) {

func MyMiddleware(h message.HandlerFunc) message.HandlerFunc {
return func(message message.Message) ([]message.Message, error) {
fields := watermill.LogFields{â€œnameâ€: m.Name}
logger.Info(â€œmyMiddleware beforeâ€, fields)
ms, err := h(message)
logger.Info(â€œmyMiddleware afterâ€, fields)
return ms, err
}
}

ä½¿ç”¨RabbitMQéœ€è¦å…ˆè¿è¡ŒRabbitMQç¨‹åºï¼ŒRabbitMQé‡‡ç”¨Erlangå¼€å‘ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹‹å‰å¾ˆå¤šæ–‡ç« ä¹Ÿä»‹ç»è¿‡ windows ä¸Šçš„è½¯ä»¶å®‰è£…ç¥å™¨chocoã€‚ä½¿ç”¨chocoå®‰è£…RabbitMQï¼š

$ go get -u github.com/ThreeDotsLabs/watermill-amqp/pkg/amqp
å‘å¸ƒè®¢é˜…ï¼š



var amqpURI = â€œamqp://localhost:5672/â€



func main() {
amqpConfig := amqp.NewDurableQueueConfig(amqpURI)



subscriber, err := amqp.NewSubscriber(
amqpConfig,
watermill.NewStdLogger(false, false),
)
if err != nil {
panic(err)
}



messages, err := subscriber.Subscribe(context.Background(), â€œexample.topicâ€)
if err != nil {
panic(err)
}



go process(messages)



publisher, err := amqp.NewPublisher(amqpConfig, watermill.NewStdLogger(false, false))
if err != nil {
panic(err)
}



publishMessages(publisher)
}



func publishMessages(publisher message.Publisher) {
for {
msg := message.NewMessage(watermill.NewUUID(), []byte(â€œHello, world!â€))



if err := publisher.Publish("example.topic", msg); err != nil {

  panic(err)

}



time.Sleep(time.Second)   } }


func process(messages <-chan *message.Message) {
for msg := range messages {
log.Printf(â€œreceived message: %s, payload: %sâ€, msg.UUID, string(msg.Payload))
msg.Ack()
}
}
